oracle.dss.graph
Class PFJ

java.lang.Object
  oracle.dss.graph.pfj.PerspectiveBase
      oracle.dss.graph.pfj.Perspective
          oracle.dss.graph.PFJ
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.event.KeyListener, java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, oracle.dss.graph.pfj.event.TDGListener
public class PFJ
extends oracle.dss.graph.pfj.Perspective

See Also:
Serialized Form
For internal use only. Application developers should not use this
The Perspective for Java (PFJ) component of the graph bean. Perspective for Java is the third-party display engine for the CommonGraph. Application developers do not need to call the methods in this class.

This class represents a single component of the graph view. The graph creates the component objects that are components in the PFJ engine, such as the plot area, the X-axis, and so on.

Constructor Detail

PFJ

public PFJ()
Constructor. Application developers do not have to create this object, because the graph does it automatically.

Method Detail

cleanUp

protected void cleanUp()
This method releases memory used by this component.

calcRiserWidth

protected int calcRiserWidth()
Calculate the desired setting for the RiserWidth property in PFJ, in order to constrain bar width to be less than the value of the MaxBarWidth property. This method is called from within the overridden calc() method in PFJ. This method calculates the desired value for the PFJ RiserWidth property based on current bar size and the current value of MaxBarWidth.

Overrides:
calcRiserWidth in class oracle.dss.graph.pfj.Perspective
Returns:
the desired setting for the RiserWidth property

isCalculated

protected boolean isCalculated()
For internal use only. Application developers should not use this
